column1: Uchi////By far best Asian food ever! I loved this place
column2: You have to go to this place and have this delicious dishes. The plates are a combination of flavors that I had never tried before. Prices might seem high if you compare it with all the others regular restaurant in Houston but if you are talking about nation wide
column3: my husband and I had payed a lot more for a meal and had not got the quality of food you get in this place. Definitely a great experience words can not describe
